intro: Corrigiola drymarioides, commonly known as sea blite, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing, succulent perennial that typically thrives in coastal and saline environments. Its botanical characteristics make it an important component of coastal ecosystems.
